entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of snow late in the evening and overnight. Snow at times heavy beginning before morning. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
